langError:
Language {{lang}} does not exist.
List of available languages: {{langs}}
noPermission: It seems you don't have permission to do that.
thanks: Thanks for using Quizzar! Type !jhelp in any channel to the see the commands.
questionDelaySet: The delay to answer a question have been set to {{delay}} ms
questionDelayError:
The delay must be between 2500ms and 1800000ms. 
Example: **!jdelayq 5000**
answerDelaySet: The answer displaying delay have been set to {{delay}} ms
answerDelayError:
The delay must be between 500ms and 50000ms. 
Example: **!jdelaya 5000**
difficultySet: The default difficulty have been set to {{difficulty}}
difficultyError:
The default difficulty must be between 0 and 3. 
Example: **!jdefdif 0**
Use !jdif to see all difficulties.
questionsAmountSet: The default questions amount have been set to {{amount}}
questionsAmountError:
The questions amount must be between 1 and 100. 
Example: !jdefques 5
twoWinners: {{p1}} and {{p2}} with a total of {{points}} points !
oneWinner: The winner is {{player}} with a total of {{points}} points !
mutlipleWinners: and {{player}} with a total of {{points}} points !
resettedError: Error hapenned while deleting settings: no setting existing.
channelNotInList: This channel is not in authorized list.
channelDeletedError: Error hapenned while deleting the channel.
error:
Error hapenned, game stopped. This error might be caused by missing permissions or by API malfunction.
If you are sure that the permissions are set correctly please try again later or join the support server to get help.
noGameRunning: No game are running in this channel, use this command in the broken channel
useAgain: You may now use the bot again
maintenanceScheduled: **Warning: a maintenance is scheduled, the bot will stop in {{minutes}} minutes.**
tryAgainLater: A maintenance is scheduled, please try again a bit later.
prefixError: Error hapenned: The prefix must be between 1 and 3 characters and must be ASCII only.
gameRestored: It seems that the bot rebooted during your game, it was restored.
